titles.title: A bill to authorize a certificate of documentation for certain vessels.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 100-422.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 794.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

bill.summary: 5/19/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue certificates of documentation for two named vessels.
